meanings.definition: The state of being alone or isolated.
meanings.sent1: Her solitariness in the forest brought her peace and quiet.
meanings.sent2: The solitariness of the old man was evident in his daily walks by himself.
meanings.sent3: The solitariness of the cat made the other pets wonder why it never joined them.
meanings.sent4: The solitariness of the mountain peak made it a perfect spot for meditation.
meanings.sent5: The solitariness of the desert at night was both eerie and beautiful.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being solitary.
meanings.sent1: The solitariness of the cabin in the woods made it a perfect retreat.
meanings.sent2: His solitariness was evident in the way he preferred to work alone.
meanings.sent3: The solitariness of the library was disturbed by the loud group of students.
meanings.sent4: The solitariness of the lighthouse keeper was like that of a guardian of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The solitariness of the artist's studio allowed for deep concentration and creativity.
